    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L5
    [var]                                   1         3
    [i]                                     5         5
    [=]                                     7         7
    [0]                                     9         9
    [;]                                     10        10
L10
    [i]                                     1         1
    [++]                                    2         3
    [;]                                     4         4
EOF
